name: Santa's Xmas Crisis! (Pre Alpha Demo)
description:
Pre-Alpha WIP Demo...

Controls:
Joypad compatible.
Keyboard: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, ESC for menu.

Help Santa collect all his presents across 6 levels in this fun little platformer!

First time developer, game currently in development due to release December 2023, this demo should give a good idea of what to expect in the full game,

hope you enjoy!
